channel.title: Problem with Demon Classic
channel.description:
I get this when i try run my server.. [code] Buildfile: build.xml
demonikp2p: [java] [07:35:33 22-08-08] Server starting up... [java] .\conf [java] [07:35:35 22-08-08] Communications link failure due to underlying ex ception: [java] [java] ** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION ** [java] [java] java.net.SocketException [java] MESSAGE: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect [java] [java] STACKTRACE: [java] [java] java.net.SocketException: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refu sed: connect [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFa ctory.java:156) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:284) [java] [07:35:35 22-08-08] Connected to MySQL [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2565) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1485) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDri ver.java:266) [java] at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) [java] at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) [java] at com.rscd.sql.DatabaseManager.getDatabaseConnection(DatabaseMa nager.java:34) [java] at com.rscd.Server.main(Server.java:52) [java] [java] [java] ** END NESTED EXCEPTION ** [java] [java] [java] [java] Last packet sent to the server was 78 ms ago. [java] [07:35:49 22-08-08] GameEngine now running [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.Server.main(Server.java:60) [java] [07:35:50 22-08-08] The server encountered an error while unfreezing players [java] Successfully saved 0 players. [java] Successfully saved 0 players. [java] Successfully saved 0 players. [java] Successfully saved 0 players. [/code]

item.title: Problem with Demon Classic
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

Try running mysql first, and demon classic has a npc bug where you can’t kill npcs so you can’t get points. So don’t use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Demon Classic
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:

I get this when i try run my server…

Buildfile: build.xml

demonikp2p:
     [java] [07:35:33 22-08-08] Server starting up...
